item.title: WiseTech Global 任命内部人士 Zubin Appoo 为永久首席执行官
item.description: 澳大利亚物流软件制造商 WiseTech Global 周一表示，已任命其参谋长 Zubin Appoo 为公司永久首席执行官，接替临时首席执行官 Andrew Cartledge。【原文：Australian logistics software maker WiseTech Global on Monday said it named its chief of staff, Zubin Appoo, as its permanent chief executive, to replace interim CEO Andrew Cartledge.】

item.title: 不敌美国的欧洲接受了最差的美国贸易协定
item.description: 最终，欧洲发现自己缺乏影响力，无法按照自己的条件将唐纳德-特朗普的美国拉入贸易协定，因此签署了一份自己还能接受的协议--尽管这份协议明显对美国有利。【原文：In the end, Europe found it lacked the leverage to pull Donald Trump's America into a trade pact on its terms and so has signed up to a deal it can just about stomach - albeit one that is clearly skewed in the U.S.'s favour.】

item.title: 欧盟与美国周日就贸易协议的主要内容达成一致
item.description: 美国和欧盟周日就一项框架贸易协议达成一致，结束了大西洋两岸工业和消费者数月来的不确定性。【原文：The U.S. and the European Union agreed on a framework trade deal on Sunday, ending months of uncertainty for industry and consumers on both sides of the Atlantic.】

item.title: 欧盟冯德莱恩：贸易协议在不确定时期带来确定性
item.description: 欧盟委员会主席乌苏拉-冯德莱恩（Ursula von der Leyen）周日表示，美国对欧盟进口商品征收 15%的基准税率将适用于汽车、半导体和医药产品。【原文：European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen on Sunday said a U.S. baseline tariff rate of 15% on imported EU goods would apply to cars, semiconductors and pharmaceutical goods.】

item.title: 美国预计两周内对芯片进口调查有结果
item.description: 美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）周日表示，特朗普政府将在两周内宣布对半导体进口进行国家安全调查的结果，但未提供详情。【原文：The Trump administration will announce the result of a national security probe into imports of semiconductors in two weeks, Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick said on Sunday, without providing details.】

item.title: VIEW 对美国和欧盟贸易协定的反应
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周日表示，美国和欧盟已就一项贸易协议达成协议，其中包括对欧盟进入美国的商品征收15%的关税，以及欧盟大量采购美国能源和军事装备。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Sunday said the United States and the European Union had reached agreement on a trade deal that includes a 15% tariff on EU goods entering the U.S. and significant EU purchases of U.S. energy and military equipment.】

item.title: 波音公司的合同提议遭工会成员拒绝
item.description: 在圣路易斯地区组装波音战斗机的工会成员周日以 "压倒性多数票 "否决了波音公司的合同提议。【原文：Union members who assemble Boeing's fighter jets in the St. Louis area have "overwhelmingly voted" to reject the company's contract offer on Sunday.】

item.title: 美国与欧盟达成贸易协议，欧盟将全面征收 15%的关税
item.description: 特朗普说，该协议包括欧盟对美国能源和军事装备的大量采购，以及欧盟对美国 6000 亿美元的投资。【原文：The deal includes significant EU purchases of U.S. energy and military equipment and $600 billion in investments in the U.S. by the European Union, Trump said.】

item.title: 特朗普称美国即将与中国达成贸易协议
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周日表示，他的政府即将与中国达成一项贸易协议，但没有透露其他细节。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Sunday his administration was close to reaching a trade deal with China, but gave no other details.】

item.title: 南华早报》报道：中美将在瑞典谈判中将关税暂停再延长90天
item.description: 据《南华早报》（SCMP）周日援引熟悉内情的人士的话报道，北京和华盛顿有望在周一开始的斯德哥尔摩贸易谈判中将关税休战再延长三个月。【原文：Beijing and Washington are expected to extend their tariff truce by another three months at trade talks in Stockholm beginning on Monday, the South China Morning Post (SCMP) reported on Sunday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 孟加拉国订购 25 架波音飞机，作为推动缓解美国关税的一部分
item.description: 一位高级官员周日表示，孟加拉国已向波音公司订购了 25 架飞机，并加大了对主要美国商品的进口，以努力化解贸易紧张局势，降低特朗普政府征收的高额关税。【原文：Bangladesh has ordered 25 aircraft from Boeing and ramped up imports of key American goods in an effort to defuse trade tensions and bring down the steep tariffs imposed by the Trump administration, a senior official said on Sunday.】

item.title: 中美重启关税谈判，努力延长停战期
item.description: 中美两国高级谈判代表周一在斯德哥尔摩举行会晤，以解决两国贸易战核心的长期经济纠纷，旨在延长休战期，避免大幅提高关税。【原文：Senior U.S. and Chinese negotiators meet in Stockholm on Monday to tackle longstanding economic disputes at the centre of the countries' trade war, aiming to extend a truce keeping sharply higher tariffs at bay.】

item.title: 美国商务部长称特朗普非常喜欢 TikTok，但应用程序必须转为美国所有
item.description: 美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）周日表示，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普喜欢TikTok，但这款由中国人拥有的短视频应用程序必须转为美国人所有。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump likes TikTok but the Chinese-owned short video app, used by some 170 million Americans, has to move to U.S. ownership, Secretary of Commerce Howard Lutnick said on Sunday.】

item.title: 美国商务部长称欧洲必须开放市场才能达成降低关税协议
item.description: 美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）周日表示，欧盟必须对美国出口产品开放市场，以说服美国总统唐纳德-特朗普降低威胁将于8月1日生效的30%的关税税率。【原文：The European Union must open up its markets for U.S. exports in order to convince U.S. President Donald Trump to reduce a threatened 30% tariff rate due to kick in on August 1, U.S. Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick said on Sunday, adding Brussels clearly wanted to make a deal.】

item.title: 美国亚马逊浆果阿萨伊爱好者将感受到关税压力
item.description: 几乎所有在美国、欧洲和亚洲销售的阿萨伊果肉都来自巴西。【原文：Nearly all of the açaí pulp sold in the U.S., as well as in Europe and Asia, where people have also developed a taste for the tangy fruit, comes from Brazil.】

item.title: 印度科技公司 TCS 将裁员 2%，影响 1.2 万多个工作岗位
item.description: 印度最大的 IT 服务提供商塔塔咨询服务公司周日表示，将在 2026 财年裁员 2%，主要影响中高层管理人员。【原文：India's largest IT services provider Tata Consultancy Services will reduce its workforce by 2% in its 2026 financial year, primarily affecting middle and senior management, the company said on Sunday.】

item.title: 南华早报》称美国商业代表团将访华
item.description: 据《南华早报》周日援引两位熟悉内情的消息人士的话报道，美中贸易全国委员会的一个高级代表团将于本周访问中国，并有望会见中国高级官员。【原文：A high-level delegation from the U.S.-China Business Council will visit China this week and is expected to meet senior Chinese officials, the South China Morning Post reported on Sunday, citing two sources familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普和欧盟冯德莱恩将于周日会晤，以达成贸易协议，避免贸易战
item.description: 欧盟委员会主席乌苏拉-冯德莱恩（Ursula von der Leyen）将于周日与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）会面，以达成一项针对欧洲的贸易协议，该协议可能会对大多数欧盟商品征收 15%的基准关税，但会结束欧盟公司数月来的不确定性。【原文：European Commission President Ursula von der Leyen is set to meet U.S. President Donald Trump on Sunday to clinch a trade deal for Europe that would likely see a 15% baseline tariff on most EU goods, but end months of uncertainty for EU companies.】

item.title: 6 月份中国工业利润进一步下降
item.description: 周日的数据显示，6月份中国工业利润继续下降，原因是在国内需求低迷和全球贸易不确定性挥之不去的情况下，根深蒂固的生产通缩给企业带来了更大的利润压力。【原文：China's industrial profits continued to fall in June, data showed on Sunday, as entrenched producer deflation put more margin pressure on businesses in the face of subdued domestic demand and lingering global trade uncertainty.】

item.title: 据《商业内幕》报道，特斯拉向机器人出租车用户介绍加州司机式服务的最新情况
item.description: 据《商业内幕》（Business Insider）援引特斯拉周六发送给用户的通知截图报道，特斯拉向机器人出租车用户发送了一份新的服务条款协议，详细说明了其计划在加州湾区推出的服务。 该通知称："如果您的乘车服务在加利福尼亚州进行，则将根据加利福尼亚州公用事业委员会的授权，由一名安全驾驶员使用全自动驾驶（监督）系统进行。"通知还补充说，在加利福尼亚州以外的乘车服务将 "自动进行"，这证实了路透社一天前的报道。【原文：Tesla sent robotaxi users a new terms-of-service agreement detailing its planned launch in California's Bay Area, Business Insider reported citing a screenshot of the notification sent to users on Saturday. The notification said, "If your ride is taking place in California, it is being conducted with a safety driver using Full Self-Driving (Supervised) pursuant to authority from the California Public Utilities Commission," adding that rides taken outside California are "conducted autonomously," confirming Reuters reporting from a day earlier.】

item.title: 女性交友应用 Tea 报告 7.2 万张图片在安全漏洞中被盗
item.description: Tea 是一款允许女性匿名评论和评论与男性约会的应用程序，该公司称遭遇了数据泄露，黑客获得了 72,000 张用户图片。【原文：Tea, an app that lets women anonymously comment and review dates with men, said it has suffered a data breach, with hackers gaining access to 72,000 user images.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，联合太平洋公司可能在下周初达成收购诺福克南方公司的协议
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周五援引知情人士的话报道，美国最大的铁路运营商联合太平洋铁路公司（Union Pacific）最快可能在下周初达成收购竞争对手诺福克南方铁路公司（Norfolk Southern）的协议。【原文：Union Pacific , the largest U.S. railroad operator, could reach an agreement to acquire rival Norfolk Southern as soon as early next week, Bloomberg News reported on Friday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧盟首脑冯德莱恩前往苏格兰与特朗普举行贸易谈判
item.description: 欧盟委员会发言人称，欧盟委员会主席乌苏拉-冯德莱恩（Ursula von der Leyen）在周日下午与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）会晤前于周六前往苏格兰，欧盟官员称双方正接近达成贸易协议。【原文：EU Commission President Ursula von der Leyen headed to Scotland on Saturday ahead of a meeting with U.S. President Donald Trump on Sunday afternoon, commission spokespeople said, as EU officials said the two sides were nearing a trade agreement.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，KKR 正在洽谈收购 ST Telemedia 全球数据中心事宜
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周六援引知情人士的话报道，美国投资公司 KKR 正在洽谈收购总部位于新加坡的 ST Telemedia Global Data Centres，这笔交易可能会使这家亚洲基础设施供应商的估值超过 50 亿美元。【原文：U.S. investment firm KKR is in talks to buy Singapore-based ST Telemedia Global Data Centres in a deal that could value the Asian infrastructure provider at more than $5 billion, Bloomberg News reported on Saturday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: WeRide 在上海获得机器人轴许可证
item.description: 中国自动驾驶技术公司WeRide周六表示，它已获得上海市政府颁发的经营自动驾驶机器人出租车打车服务的许可证。【原文：Chinese autonomous driving technology company WeRide said on Saturday it has been granted a permit from the Shanghai municipal government to operate autonomous robotaxi ride-hailing services.】

item.title: 日本称贸易协议中的 5500 亿美元一揽子方案可为美国的台湾芯片制造商提供资金
item.description: 日本最高贸易谈判代表 Ryosei Akazawa 周六表示，日本在本周美国关税协议中达成的 5500 亿美元投资一揽子计划可能有助于资助一家台湾公司在美国建设半导体工厂。【原文：Japan's $550 billion investment package agreed in this week's U.S. tariff deal could help finance a Taiwanese firm building semiconductor plants in the U.S., Japan's top trade negotiator Ryosei Akazawa said on Saturday.】

item.title: 彭博新闻社报道：美国卫生官员和科技高管将启动数据共享计划
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周六报道，特朗普政府的高级卫生官员预计将于本周把科技公司带到白宫，推出一项鼓励更无缝共享医疗数据的计划。【原文：Top Trump administration health officials are expected to bring tech companies to the White House this week to roll out a plan to encourage more seamless sharing of health-care data, Bloomberg News reported on Saturday.】

item.title: 安联人寿称大部分客户数据在黑客攻击中被盗
item.description: 美国保险巨头安联人寿（Allianz Life）周六表示，黑客窃取了其大部分客户、金融专业人士和部分安联人寿员工的个人信息。【原文：U.S. insurance giant Allianz Life said on Saturday that hackers stole the personal information of the majority of its customers, financial professionals, and select Allianz Life employees.】

item.title: AI&US "这是我生命中最具同理心的声音"：人工智能如何改变神经变异者的生活
item.description: 对于来自开普敦的电影制片人凯特-多特曼（Kate D'hotman）来说，与电影观众建立联系是一件自然而然的事情。与他人交谈则要困难得多。"这位 40 岁的恐怖片导演说："我一直不明白人们是如何（解读）社交暗示的。【原文：For Cape Town-based filmmaker Kate D’hotman, connecting with movie audiences comes naturally. Far more daunting is speaking with others. “I’ve never understood how people [decipher] social cues,” the 40-year-old director of horror films says.】

item.title: 华为展示人工智能计算系统，媲美英伟达顶级产品
item.description: 中国华为技术公司周六展示了一套人工智能计算系统，一位业内专家称这套系统可与英伟达（Nvidia）最先进的产品相媲美。【原文：China's Huawei Technologies showed off an AI computing system on Saturday that one industry expert has said rivals Nvidia's most advanced offering, as the Chinese technology giant seeks to capture market share in the country's growing artificial intelligence sector.】
